data.title: Architectural Space and the Imagination: Houses in Literature and Art from Classical to Contemporary [1st ed.] 9783030360665, 9783030360672
data.meta_description: This book sheds light on the intimate relationship between built space and the mind, exploring the ways in which archite...

Front Matter ....Pages 67-67

Yeats’s Stanzas, Yeats’s Rooms (Adam Hanna)....Pages 167-179
